Comment: So a couple things can be true at once.  1) he does genuinely care about giving Americans a good life. 2) he does personally profit from his position. 3) more specifically he trades on his socialist creds to further his personal position (in order to further his personal profits)  If it weren't for #3 I could respect the guy.  #1 is good, and I don't even necessarily have any problem with #2 (I'm not a socialist; other people's good fortune neither offends, nor harms me) I have no problem with someone personally profiting as a result of helping others, so long as they actually are helping others in the process.  A rising tide lifts all boats after all.  What I have a problem with is not living the rhetoric you speak.  Bernie has made his career, and continues to maintain it, by his rhetoric that doing what he's doing is bad.  I can't respect anyone who talks the talk but won't walk the walk.
